'''''The Rule of Three''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[The Rhythm that Leads to the Gloomy Path]]'', ''[[The Rhythm that Nurtures the Sprout]]'', and ''[[The Rhythm that Reveals the Beastly Trail]]''.
